thread.title: Keep Things Bright With This Season's Handbags - WSJ.com

author: Photography Marius W. Hansen
title: Keep Things Bright With This Season's Handbags - WSJ.com
text: Keep Things Bright With This Season's Handbags The latest top-shelf handbags sport animal prints, metallics, logos and more. Photography by Marius W. Hansen; Set Design by Mila Taylor-Young; Fashion Editor David Thielebeule Scroll COLORING AGENT Throw in a touch of pastel pigment. Clockwise from top left: Ralph Lauren Collection, $1,100, select Ralph Lauren stores, Longchamp, $775, longchamp​.com, Hermès, $3,500, Hermès stores nationwide, Tod’s, $1,745, tods​.com, Bally, $1,235, Bally, 689 Madison Avenue, New York. Photography by Marius W. Hansen; Set Design by Mila Taylor-Young; Fashion Editor David Thielebeule CREATURE COMFORTS An animal print does everything but blend in. Clockwise from top left: Roberto Cavalli, $3,650, robertocavalli​.com, Akris, $2,390, akris.ch, Saint Laurent by Anthony Vaccarello, $3,850, Saint Laurent, 3 East 57th Street, New York, Stuart Weitzman, $595, stuartweitzman​.com, Bottega Veneta, $5,200, 800-845-6790. Photography by Marius W. Hansen; Set Design by Mila Taylor-Young; Fashion Editor David Thielebeule CHORE THING Go bold with a metallic bag. Clockwise from top: Chloé, $2,355, chloe​.com, Louis Vuitton, $3,750, select Louis Vuitton stores, Alexander McQueen, $1,790, Alexander McQueen, 747 Madison Avenue, New York, Gucci, $1,790, select Gucci stores nationwide. Photography by Marius W. Hansen; Set Design by Mila Taylor-Young; Fashion Editor David Thielebeule TAG TEAM Classic logos have a fresh appeal. Clockwise from top left: Max Mara, $930, Max Mara, 813 Madison Avenue, New York, MCM, $650, mcmworldwide​.com, Fendi, $3,590, fendi​.com, Dior, $2,750, Dior boutiques nationwide, Balenciaga, $1,990, balenciaga​.com. Photography by Marius W. Hansen; Set Design by Mila Taylor-Young; Fashion Editor David Thielebeule SPIN CYCLE Floral prints add a punch of color. Clockwise from top left: Etro, $1,770, etro​.com, Furla, $448, furla​.com, Prada, $2,470, select Prada boutiques, Giorgio Armani, $2,695, select Giorgio Armani boutiques. Photography by Marius W. Hansen; Set Design by Mila Taylor-Young; Fashion Editor David Thielebeule GET WEAVING Basket bags showcase their endless adaptability. From top: Miu Miu, $1,560, miumiu​.com, Michael Kors Collection, $990, michaelkors​.com, Proenza Schouler, $1,645, Proenza Schouler, 121 Greene Street, New York. Photography by Marius W. Hansen; Set Design by Mila Taylor-Young; Fashion Editor David Thielebeule Advertisement
